scenes.background: Bob thanks you for reviewing the document.
scenes.description: Can you also help us with the final presentation slides?

options.text: I can help streamline the slides quickly. Send them over.
options.analysis: You agreed to help with the slides, showing empathy and motivation, but potentially compromising your self-regulation.

options.text: I think you can handle it. Let's finalize it when I'm back.
options.analysis: You suggested handling it later, maintaining boundaries and demonstrating good self-regulation, but empathy and motivation were lower.

options.text: I'm afraid I can't. Please proceed without me and update me later.
options.analysis: You prioritized your leave, showing good emotional perception and self-regulation, but social skills could improve.
